inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years, male or female
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum alanine or aspartate aminotransferase activities that are above the upper limit of normal (ALT greater than 41 or AST greater than 31 U/L) on an average of three determinations taken during the previous 6 months.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Evidence of chronic hepatitis on liver biopsy done within the previous 12 months with a necroinflammatory score in histology activity index of at least 5 (out of a maximum of 18) and at least 1 for hepatic fibrosis (out of a maximum of 6).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Presence of HDV antigen in liver tissue
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Previous standard alpha interferon or other antiviral activity will not exclude patients.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Active HBV replication will not exclude patients.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated liver disease, as marked by bilirubin greater than 4 mg%, albumin less than 3.0 gm%, prothrombin time greater than 2 sec prolonged, or history of bleeding esophageal varices, ascites or hepatic encephalopathy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or, in women of child-bearing potential or in spouses of such women, inability to practice adequate contraception defined as vasectomy in men, tubal ligation in women, or use of condoms and spermicide, or birth control pills, or an intrauterine device, or Depo-Provera, or Norplant.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Significant systemic or major illnesses other than liver disease, including, but not limited to, congestive heart failure, renal failure (creatinine clearance less than 50 ml/min), organ transplantation, serious psychiatric disease or depression (only if felt to be at high risk by the NIH psychiatric consultation service), and angina pectoris.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppressive therapy within the last 6 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of another form of liver disease in addition to viral hepatitis (for example autoimmune liver disease, Wilson's disease, alcoholic liver disease, hemochromatosis, and alpha-1-antitrypsin deficiency).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has HCV cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, recent admission for UGIB. Patient also describes new imbalance leading to a fall during which he may have hit his head on.
